Ghosts can be assigned as a Slayer task at level 13 combat by Turael, Spria, and Mazchna. Ghosts spawn in various locations throughout Gielinor.

Only regular ghosts, tortured souls, and death wings can be killed to satisfy the task. Spectres, ghasts, and shades will not count towards the task.

Most areas that contain ghosts contain those of combat levels 19, 24, and 29. Ghosts with a combat level of 76 and 77 can only be found in the Sepulchre of Death, the bottom floor of the Stronghold of Security.

Forgotten Soul 20 50
  • Crumbling Tower
 Low-level ghost that has a decent drop table.
Tortured soul 59 51
  • Outside Ectofuntus
  • West of Port Phasmatys
 Tortured souls are a good choice for mid levels with access to Morytania.
Death wing 83 80
  • Viyeldi caves
 Death wings grant the largest amount of Slayer experience; however, they are less accessible than level 77 ghosts due to its quest requirement.

Taverley Dungeon 14 No Yes No

West of Port Phasmatys 2 No Yes Yes Completion of Priest in Peril required.
